description.en:
1) Love Cafe?  
Baby-faced college student Miwa jumps at the chance to work at the elite restaurant. Being trained by strict Himekura is hard, but Miwa admires the elegant waiter and ignores the rumors that Himekura is the owner's lover. But accidentally witnessing a tender moment between them has repercussions for Miwa he never anticipated…  
  
2) Love Cafe –36.5˚C–  
Nobunaga loves pretty things and a regular customer Yui has cought his eye. Unfortunately Yui dislikes all the things Nobunaga recommends. Can Nobunaga get Yui's approval…?  
  
3) Love Cafe  
A short sequel. Himekura is serving Yui and they look good together. What will Nobunaga and Miwa do?  
  
4) The Window Cleaner and the Director  
A student becomes a window cleaner as his part-time job during his summer vacation for his hobby, overseas travels. He catches the eyes of one young CEO through the window, then he is suddenly fired and goes to a job interview, but he finds himself forcibly lured into the arms of Director Tsunaga Keiichi!  
  
5) Alice and Daikichi & Comment  
Daikichi is a dog that goes to propose to a plush rabbit Alice everyday.  
  
6) Marooned Honeymoon  
The son of the CEO of a large company get marooned on an island with his secretary whilst on a surveying trip.  
  
7) The Young Director's Elegant Lifestyle  
They finally make it back to mainland and their life as a happy couple starts now…?
